attributes.action: Mira miller doesn't support equality so why is she Minister for Equality?
attributes.additional_details:
Maria Miller Voted Against:

Gay adoption Rights

The Human fertilisation and embryology Bill (would have given lesbian couples the right to receive fertility treatment)

the Racial and Religious hatred bill

She is in favour of defining homophobia, racial hatred and prejudice as simply just "freedom of speech"

David Cameron has just made her Minister for Equality..

David Cameron please explain why you choose this person for such a sensitive role?
